requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 @ 3.4 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce 970 GTX (4GB VRAM), AMD RX560 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game contains EAC anti-cheat technology.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: i7-4970K @ 4.0GHZ, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X @3.5GHZ
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce 1080 TI GTX (11GB VRAM), AMD Vega 64 (8GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game contains EAC anti-cheat technology.
